nodes.text: The AestheTech Incorporated Appearance Designer was a beauty device in use during the Cold War and Galactic War that could painlessly alter any part of the body. While the technical specifications of the Appearance Designer were a well kept secret, all major galactic medical and safety organizations approved of it.

The Appearance Designer first appeared in "Star Wars: The Old Republic" as the method of altering the player's appearance. The player's species can be altered, which is most likely just a game mechanic.
